Description: Define organizational priorities. Seek out partners and funding opportunities. Work with stakeholders to define contract requirements.
Investigate access gaps. Locate resources. Collect and organize information. Perform analysis and generate reports.
Lead grant-writing efforts. Be responsible for obtaining necessary approvals, meeting all grant requirements, and submitting on time.
Design and code website. Update content as needed.
Determine best practices. Maintain the physical space. Set and enforce policies.
